title: Pita Pit - Peakview Way
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Fast food, Salad bar, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A large international fast food franchise offering pita pocket sandwiches, smoothies, salads and more. You custom make your order by choosing your fillings and sauces. Vegan fillings include fresh veggies, hummus, a black bean burger, and falafel. Charts in the store show vegan items.
